text.p: The Shavian Set is a database and a mechanism for automated translation into the Shavian alphabet. It contains all the words from the Shavian wiki, augmented by the contents of CMUDict. is possible using a part-of-speech-based system using data from the Brown tagger. More details are in the credits.
The version number is the number of the highest relevant change in the wiki.
More details about the mechanism, and an analysis of its effectiveness, will appear here later.

p.a: You can test the system here.

text.p: You can download the most recent version (print a[12:20],) here (796K.)
